2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="WhitespaceAfter">
        <property name="id" value="WhitespaceAfter"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="STRING_LITERAL, CHAR_LITERAL"/>
        <property name="allowLineBreaks" value="false"/>
        <property name="option" value="space"/>
    </module>
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='PackageDeclaration'>
        <property name='id' value='PackageDeclaration'/>
    </module>
    <module name='OneTopLevelClass'>
        <property name='id' value='OneTopLevelClass'/>
    </module>"
}
3.4.2 Ordering of class contents:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='DeclarationOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='declarationOrder'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, CTOR_DEF, METHOD_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="Indentation">
        <property name="basicOffset" value="4"/>
        <property name="caseIndent" value="4"/>
        <property name="throwsIndent" value="4"/>
        <property name="lineWrappingIndentation" value="4"/>
    </module>
}
4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.2 Nonempty blocks: K & R style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, OBJECT_INIT, STATIC_INIT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}
4.3 One statement per line:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="OneStatementPerLine">
        <property name="id" value="OneStatementPerLine"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, SEMI"/>
    </module>
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="OperatorWrap">
        <property name="option" value="NL"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="EQUAL, COLON"/>
    </module>
    <module name="SeparatorWrap">
        <property name="id" value="SeparatorWrapNL"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="DOT, METHOD_REF, AMPERSAND, PIPE"/>
        <property name="option" value="nl"/>
    </module>
    <module name="SeparatorWrap">
        <property name="id" value="SeparatorWrapEOL"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="COMMA"/>
        <property name="option" value="EOL"/>
    </module>
    <module name="MethodParamPad">
        <property name="allowLineBreaks" value="true"/>
        <property name="option" value="space"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="METHOD_DEF"/>
    </module>
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="Indentation">
        <property name="basicOffset" value="4"/>
        <property name="caseIndent" value="4"/>
        <property name="throwsIndent" value="4"/>
        <property name="lineWrappingIndentation" value="4"/>
    </module>
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR, BOR_ASSIGN, COLON, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAMBDA, LE, LOR, LT, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, QUESTION, SL, SLIST, SL_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, TYPE_EXTENSION_OR'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='RPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='allow'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='TYPE'/>
        <property name='option' value='ignore'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='ModifierOrder'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
    </module>"
}
5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="TypeName">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/>
        <property name="allowDigits" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="MethodName">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/>
        <property name="allowDigits" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="ParameterName">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/>
        <property name="allowDigits" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="VariableName">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/>
        <property name="allowDigits" value="true"/>
    </module>
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="PackageDeclaration">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z]+(\.[a-z0-9]+)*$"/>
        <property name="message" value="Package name must use only lowercase letters and digits with no underscores"/>
    </module>
}
5.2.2 Class names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="TypeName">
        <property name="format" value="^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/>
        <property name="ignoreAnnotations" value="true"/>
        <property name="ignoreInterface" value="false"/>
        <property name="ignorePrimitive" value="true"/>
        <property name="ignoreUpperBound" value="true"/>
    </module>
}
5.2.3 Method names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="MethodName">
        <property name="format" value="^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/>
        <property name="formatViolationMessage" value="Method name must be in lowerCamelCase"/>
    </module>
}
5.2.4 Constant names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ConstantName'>
        <property name='format' value='UPPER_SNAKE_CASE'/>
        <property name='ignoreScope' value='private'/>
        <property name='ignoreScopeRegex' value='^nonFinal$|^nonStatic$|^mutableCollection$|^mutableElements$|^mutableValues$|^logger$|^nonEmptyArray$'/>
    </module>"
}
5.3 Camel case: defined:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='MethodName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='id' value='methodName'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
6.2 Caught exceptions: not ignored:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="EmptyCatchBlock">
        <property name="id" value="emptyCatchBlock"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_CATCH"/>
        <property name="allowCommentedBlocks" value="false"/>
    </module>
}
7.1.1 General form:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='JavadocBlockTagLocation'>
        <property name='id' value='JavadocBlockTagLocation'/>
        <property name='allowAtColumn' value='1'/>
        <property name='allowAfterColumn' value='1'/>
        <property name='allowBeforeColumn' value='1'/>
        <property name='allowAfterColumnComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowBeforeColumnComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowAfterColumnParam' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowBeforeColumnParam' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowAfterColumnThrows' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowBeforeColumnThrows' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
7.1.3 Block tags:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='JavadocBlockTagLocation'>
        <property name='allowAtColumn' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowFirstLine' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNewline' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowSameLine' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowSubsequentLine' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
7.2 The summary fragment:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='SummaryJavadoc'>
        <property name='forbiddenSummaryFragments' value='A{@code, Thismethodreturns, Savetherecord'/>
        <property name='allowSingleSentence' value='true'/>
        <property name='endOfSentenceFormat' value='.'/>
    </module>"
}
7.3 Where Javadoc is used:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="JavadocType">
        <property name="scope" value="public"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadoc" value="false"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadocInOverriddenMethods" value="true"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadocInPackageInfo" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="JavadocVariable">
        <property name="scope" value="public"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadoc" value="false"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadocInOverriddenMethods" value="true"/>
        <property name="allowMissingJavadocInPackageInfo" value="true"/>
    </module>
}
4.8.5.3 Method and constructor annotatio:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AnnotationLocation'>
        <property name='id' value='AnnotationLocation'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF'/>
        <property name='format' value='sameLine'/>
    </module>"
}
3.4.2.1 Overloads: never split:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OverloadMethodsDeclarationOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='overloadMethodsDeclarationOrder'/>
        <property name='sameName' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameType' value='true'/>
        <property name='samePackage' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameParent' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameParameters' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameThrows' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameAccess' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameReturn' value='true'/>
        <property name='sameCode' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='FallThrough'>
        <property name='id' value='fallthrough'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CASE_GROUP'/>

}
